import re

def find_ip_addresses(s):
    ipv4_pattern = ''
    ipv6_pattern = '\\b(?:[A-Fa-f0-9]{1,4}:){7}[A-Fa-f0-9]{1,4}\\b'
    ipv4_addresses = re.findall(ipv4_pattern, s)
    ipv6_addresses = re.findall(ipv6_pattern, s)
    return (ipv4_addresses, ipv6_addresses)

import re

def find_ip_addresses(s):
    ipv4_pattern = '\\b(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\\b'
    ipv6_pattern = ''
    ipv4_addresses = re.findall(ipv4_pattern, s)
    ipv6_addresses = re.findall(ipv6_pattern, s)
    return (ipv4_addresses, ipv6_addresses)
